author: jschreiner22
title: Open Smart Contract Library
description: Currently, there aren’t strong enough incentives in place to make collaboration the obvious solution for projects building on Cardano.

author: lpmaho
title: MLabs - Spec DSL for dApp Security
description: Cardano was designed to support secure smart contracts. Yet, testing, auditing, and even designing Cardano dApps involve serious challenges.

author: joxnow
title: Earn incentives by contributing
description: Developers who contribute to open source are not incentivized in any form, NFT owners are not utilizing their assets.

title: Bring Cardano to the web with Vite
description: There a lot of barriers right now to begin to build a dapp. You must have a set of tools that have many ways to be installed.

author: ninhtran
title: OpenSource Quadratic Voting Funding
description: Cardano open-source funding is less than $25m. We need other major donors in & out of Cardano to accelerate open-source funding and support.

title: Organization membership mgmt
description: DAOs and SCs have a standard membership/user management requirements that require reimplementation by different smart contracts.

title: Basis Cost Block Reward Accounting
description: A delegator sells some ADA rewards from years ago and reports their income using the point of sale price.

author: dimitri777

description: The F7 proposal for CCv3 is too low. Reps are professionals doing work, devoting time and should be compensated for Feb-April 2022 properly

author: raz
title: Proposal Framework Tool - AIM
description: Creating robust Catalyst proposals can be difficult. Connection with existing structures and frameworks is time consuming.

title: CardanoPlusPlus, a C++ Library
description: There is no common libraries to help C++ Developers build on Cardano.

title: Plutus-extra: Plutus helper library

title: NFT Swap Infrastructure Templates 1

author: workshopmaybe
title: Plutus Project-Based Learning
description: Keep Gimbalabs PPBL free for aspiring developers.

author: dan.mercurius
title: FOSS funding mechanism to save 🌍

author: wael
title: Cardano Tools & Software for ARM
description: Currently, there exist few tools & software built for ARM-based computers making it hard for developers to build and use existing software.

author: raz
title: Fund8Proposals + SDGs - Cardano AIM
description: Connecting UN frameworks like the SDGs to Proposals require analyses + evaluation. Support our research work in Fund 8 as in Fund 6.

author: greg
title: Android SDK
description: Mobile devs who want to integrate Cardano, have to build their own replica of tools, which requires knowledge of cryptography.

author: swhitenstall
title: Automate, Educate, Communicate
description: No incentives to provide automation tools, no provision of open source training or communication of what open source in Cardano entails.

author: dimitri777
title: Onboard Freelancers to any projects
description: We cannot afford to hire full time staff but must rely on freelancers to fulfill the various roles of our social and charitable projects

title: Find your Way Route Optimizer App
description: Complex route planning , optimization to minimize costs of vehicles picking up from multiple locations and delivering to beneficiaries.

author: cautiousfox
title: Catalyst GPS
description: Same things get discussed over and over again, nothing gets done. People have no mandate to drive change. No room for leadership to emerge.

title: NFT Verification Tool
description: There is currently no standard and commonly used tool that can verify NFTs as real

author: liqwid.labs

title: Developers Open Sourced Licensing
description: Experts hesitate to contribute to open sourced projects as they do not see direct benefits to them

author: newmindflow
title: NFT Guild: Cardano NFT Reports

title: Catalyst Treasury Guild

title: Gnosis Safe UI

title: Distributed Idea Mapping System

title: Open Source Translate 2 Earn Webapp

title: Funding Categories Analysis

title: Contributor Infrastructure Analysis

title: Catalyst Streaming Guild

title: PCDiscord - Social Media Automation

title: ADAO-Multi-sig Wallet Web Interface

description: LATAM Cardano Community participates proactively in building the Cardano Ecosystem without ensured and sustainable access to resources
